016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.day16;
017
018import static com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.Presentation.NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT;
019
020import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.model.CardinalDirection;
021import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.model.Direction;
022import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.model.MatrixLocation;
023import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.DataSource;
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.util.HashMap;
026import java.util.HashSet;
027import java.util.LinkedList;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.Queue;
031import java.util.Set;
032import java.util.stream.IntStream;
033import java.util.stream.Stream;
034
035public class LavaFloor {
036
037  private static final char VERTICAL_SPLITTER = '|';
038  private static final char HORIZONTAL_SPLITTER = '-';
039  private static final char NORTH_EAST_MIRROR = '/';
040  private static final char NORTH_WEST_MIRROR = '\\';
041  private static final MatrixLocation INITIAL_LOCATION = new MatrixLocation(0, 0);
042  private static final Direction INITIAL_DIRECTION = CardinalDirection.EAST;
043
044  private final char[][] grid;
045
046  public LavaFloor() throws IOException {
047    this(DataSource.DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE);
048  }
049
050  public LavaFloor(String inputFile) throws IOException {
051    try (Stream<String> lines = DataSource.simpleLines(inputFile, this)) {
052      grid = lines
053          .map(String::toCharArray)
054          .toArray(char[][]::new);
055    }
056  }
057
058  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
059    System.out.printf(NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT, 1, new LavaFloor().countEnergizedTiles());
060    System.out.printf(NUMERIC_SOLUTION_FORMAT, 2, new LavaFloor().countMaxEnergizedTiles());
061  }
062
063  public int countEnergizedTiles() {
064    return countEnergizedTiles(INITIAL_LOCATION, INITIAL_DIRECTION);
065  }
066
067  public int countMaxEnergizedTiles() {
068    return Stream.concat(
069        IntStream.range(0, grid.length)
070        .boxed()
071        .flatMap((rowIndex) -> Stream.of(
072            new Photon(new MatrixLocation(rowIndex, 0), CardinalDirection.EAST),
073            new Photon(new MatrixLocation(rowIndex, grid[0].length - 1), CardinalDirection.WEST)
074        )),
075        IntStream.range(0, grid[0].length)
076            .boxed()
077            .flatMap((colIndex) -> Stream.of(
078                new Photon(new MatrixLocation(0, colIndex), CardinalDirection.SOUTH),
079                new Photon(new MatrixLocation(grid.length - 1, colIndex), CardinalDirection.NORTH)
080            ))
081        )
082        .mapToInt((photon) -> countEnergizedTiles(photon.location(), photon.direction()))
083        .max()
084        .orElseThrow();
085  }
086
087  private int countEnergizedTiles(MatrixLocation initialLocation, Direction initialDirection) {
088    Map<MatrixLocation, Set<Direction>> energized = new HashMap<>();
089    Queue<Photon> photons = new LinkedList<>(List.of(new Photon(initialLocation, initialDirection)));
090    while (!photons.isEmpty()) {
091      Photon photon = photons.remove();
092      MatrixLocation location = photon.location();
093      Direction direction = photon.direction();
094      if (isInBounds(location)
095          && !energized.computeIfAbsent(location, (loc) -> new HashSet<>()).contains(direction)) {
096        energized.get(location).add(direction);
097        photons.addAll(next(location, direction));
098      }
099    }
100    return energized.size();
101  }
102
103  private boolean isInBounds(MatrixLocation location) {
104    int row = location.row();
105    int column = location.column();
106    return row >= 0 && row < grid.length && column >= 0 && column < grid[0].length;
107  }
108
109  private List<Photon> next(MatrixLocation location, Direction direction) {
110    List<Photon> photons = new LinkedList<>();
111    switch (grid[location.row()][location.column()]) {
112      case VERTICAL_SPLITTER -> {
113        if (direction.isHorizontal()) {
114          photons.add(new Photon(location.move(CardinalDirection.NORTH), CardinalDirection.NORTH));
115          photons.add(new Photon(location.move(CardinalDirection.SOUTH), CardinalDirection.SOUTH));
116        }
117      }
118      case HORIZONTAL_SPLITTER -> {
119        if (direction.isVertical()) {
120          photons.add(new Photon(location.move(CardinalDirection.WEST), CardinalDirection.WEST));
121          photons.add(new Photon(location.move(CardinalDirection.EAST), CardinalDirection.EAST));
122        }
123      }
124      case NORTH_EAST_MIRROR -> {
125        direction = (direction.isVertical()
126            ? direction.nextClockwise()
127            : direction.nextCounterClockwise());
128      }
129      case NORTH_WEST_MIRROR -> {
130        direction = (direction.isVertical()
131            ? direction.nextCounterClockwise()
132            : direction.nextClockwise());
133      }
134    }
135    if (photons.isEmpty()) {
136      photons.add(new Photon(location.move(direction), direction));
137    }
138    return photons;
139  }
140
141  private record Photon(MatrixLocation location, Direction direction) {
142  }
143
144}
